# Westchester Limousine - Business Information

## Company Overview
Westchester Limousine is a premium transportation service provider based in Mohegan Lake, New York, serving Westchester County, Putnam, Dutchess County, Connecticut, and the greater New York City area since 1995.

## Contact Information
- **Business Name**: Westchester Limousine
- **Phone**: (914) 222-1919
- **Email**: info.westchesterlimousine@gmail.com
- **Address**: 2945 Lexington Avenue, Mohegan Lake, 10547, New York, United States
- **Website**: https://westchesterlimousine.net

## Services Offered
- Airport Car Service (JFK, LaGuardia, Newark, Westchester County Airport)
- Corporate Travel & Executive Transportation
- School Transportation
- Hourly & City-to-City Limousine Service
- Proms, Weddings & Special Events Transportation

## Service Areas
- Westchester County, NY
- Putnam County, NY
- Dutchess County, NY
- Fairfield County, CT
- New Haven County, CT
- New York City Metro Area

## Business Details
- **Founded**: 1995
- **Operating Hours**: 24/7 Service
- **Office Hours**: Monday-Sunday 8AM-6PM
- **License**: Fully Licensed & Insured
- **Fleet**: Luxury sedans, SUVs, stretch limousines, executive vans

## Key Features
- Professional, licensed chauffeurs
- Real-time flight tracking for airport transfers
- Flat-rate pricing with no hidden fees
- Meet & Greet service available
- Corporate account management
- Group transportation available

## Technology Stack
- Framework: Next.js 14 (App Router)
- Language: TypeScript
- Styling: Tailwind CSS 4
- UI Components: Shadcn UI (Radix UI primitives)
